assignments.name: Assign_Property_and_Loan_Info_Stage
assignments.label: Assign Property and Loan Info Stage

formulas.name: CashFromOrToBorrowerAmt
formulas.expression: If(ISNULL({!PurchasePriceAmount}), 0, {!PurchasePriceAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!TotalDebtPaidOffAmount}), 0, {!TotalDebtPaidOffAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!RemodelAndRepairsAmount}), 0, {!RemodelAndRepairsAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount}), 0, {!LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!OutstandingLoanAmount}), 0, {!OutstandingLoanAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!BorrowerClosingCostAmt}), 0, {!BorrowerClosingCostAmt}) + If(ISNULL({!DiscountPointCostAmount}), 0, {!DiscountPointCostAmount}) - If(ISNULL({!LoanExclFinMortInsAmt}), 0, {!LoanExclFinMortInsAmt}) - If(ISNULL({!FinancedMortgageInsAmt}), 0, {!FinancedMortgageInsAmt}) - If(ISNULL({!CreditFromSeller}), 0, {!CreditFromSeller}) - If(ISNULL({!OtherCredit}), 0, {!OtherCredit})

formulas.name: TotalCashDueFromBorrower
formulas.expression: If(ISNULL({!PurchasePriceAmount}), 0, {!PurchasePriceAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!RemodelAndRepairsAmount}), 0, {!RemodelAndRepairsAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount}), 0, {!LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!OutstandingLoanAmount}), 0, {!OutstandingLoanAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!BorrowerClosingCostAmt}), 0, {!BorrowerClosingCostAmt}) + If(ISNULL({!DiscountPointCostAmount}), 0, {!DiscountPointCostAmount}) + If(ISNULL({!TotalDebtPaidOffAmount}), 0, {!TotalDebtPaidOffAmount})

formulas.name: TotalEstPaymentAmt
formulas.expression: If(ISNULL({!EstFirstMortgagePmtAmt}), 0, {!EstFirstMortgagePmtAmt})+ If(ISNULL({!EstSubordinateLienPmtAmt}), 0, {!EstSubordinateLienPmtAmt}) + If(ISNULL({!EstHomeownersInsPmtAmt}), 0, {!EstHomeownersInsPmtAmt}) + If(ISNULL({!EstSuppPropertyInsPmtAmt}), 0, {!EstSuppPropertyInsPmtAmt})+ If(ISNULL({!EstPropertyTaxesPmtAmt}), 0, {!EstPropertyTaxesPmtAmt})+ If(ISNULL({!EstMortgageInsPmtAmt}), 0, {!EstMortgageInsPmtAmt})+ If(ISNULL({!EstOtherDuesPaymentAmt}), 0, {!EstOtherDuesPaymentAmt})+ If(ISNULL({!EstOtherPaymentAmt}), 0, {!EstOtherPaymentAmt})

fields.name: Total_Mortgage_Loan_And_Credit_Amt
fields.fieldText: Total Mortgage Loans and Total Credits: {!TotalMortgageLoanAndCreditAmt}

fields.name: Cash_From_To_Borrower
fields.fieldText: Cash Due To or From Borrower: {!CashFromOrToBorrowerAmt}

fields.name: Note
fields.fieldText: Note: Cash the borrower pays or recevies at closing, not including reserves or other funds that may still required lender verification.

fields.name: HasHoEducation
fields.fieldText: One or more borrowers completed homeownership education within the last 12 months

fields.name: Completed_Education_Homeownership_Format
fields.helpText: The format of the homeownership education completed by the borrower.

fields.name: Homeownership_Education_Provider_Details
fields.helpText: If the borrower completed homeownership education, specify the provider details.

fields.name: HudApprovedProvIdentifier
fields.helpText: If the agency is HUD-approved the homeownership education provider's Housing Counseling Ageny ID.

fields.name: CounselingAgencyProvName
fields.helpText: Homeownership education provider's name if the agency isn't HUD-approved or if the Housing Counseling Agency ID is unknown.

fields.name: HoEducationCompletedDate
fields.helpText: Date borrower completed homeownership education.

fields.name: EdCompletedBorrowerName
fields.helpText: Name of borrower or borrowers who completed homeownership education.

fields.name: HasCompletedCounseling
fields.fieldText: One or more borrowers completed housing counseling within the last 12 months

fields.name: Completed_Housing_Counseling_Format
fields.helpText: The format of the housing counseling completed by the borrower.

fields.name: Provider
fields.helpText: If the borrower completed housing counseling, specify the provider details.

fields.name: HudApprAgencyIdentifier
fields.helpText: If the agency is HUD-approved, the housing counseling provider's Housing Counseling Agency ID.

fields.name: CounselingAgencyName
fields.helpText: Housing counseling provider's name if the agency isn't HUD-approved or if the Housing Counseling Agency ID is unknown.

fields.name: CounselingCompletionDate
fields.helpText: Date borrower completed housing counseling.

fields.name: CounselingComplBorrName
fields.helpText: Name of the borrower or borrowers who completed housing counseling.

fields.name: Note_Rate
fields.helpText: The percentage of interest for this loan. For example, 3.875 or 4.125.

fields.name: Loan_Term_In_Months
fields.helpText: The length of the loan in months.

fields.name: Other_Amortization_Type
fields.helpText: If other amortization type was selected, the other amortization description.

fields.name: Initial_Period_Prior_To_First_Adjustment_In_Months
fields.fieldText: Initial Period Prior to First Adjustment
fields.helpText: For an adjustable rate, the number of months before the first rate adjustment.

fields.name: Subsequent_Adjustment_Period_in_months
fields.helpText: For an adjustable rate, the number of months between subsequent rate adjustments.

fields.name: Balloon
fields.helpText: The loan includes a balloon payment.

fields.name: Balloon_Term_Months
fields.helpText: For a balloon loan, the number of months before the balloon payment is due.

fields.name: Interest_Only
fields.helpText: The loan includes an interest-only term.

fields.name: Interest_Only_Term_Months
fields.helpText: For an interest-only loan, the intitial number of months during which the borrower pays only interest.

fields.name: Negative_Amortization
fields.helpText: The loan allows deferred interest to be added to the loan balance.

fields.name: Prepayment_Penallty
fields.helpText: The loan includes a fee for paying it off ahead of schedule.

fields.name: Prepayment_Penalty_Term_Months
fields.helpText: For a prepayment penalty, the number of months during which the borrower incurs a prepayment fee for paying off the loan ahead of schedule.

fields.name: Temporary_Interest_Rate_Buydown
fields.helpText: For a temporary interest rate reduction, the temporary percentage of interest. For example, 2.875 or 3.125.

fields.name: Initial_Buydown_Rate
fields.helpText: For a temporary interest rate reduction, the temporary interest rate.

fields.name: EstFirstMortgagePmtAmt
fields.helpText: Monthly proposed payment on first mortgage including principal and interest.

fields.name: EstSubordinateLienPmtAmt
fields.helpText: Total proposed monthly payments associated with any subordinate liens on the property at the time of closing, including principal and interest.

fields.name: EstSuppPropertyInsPmtAmt
fields.helpText: Total proposed monthly payment for required additional property insurance like flood, earthquake, or other hazardous condition coverage.

fields.name: EstMortgageInsPmtAmt
fields.helpText: Total proposed monthly payment for mortagage insurance or a mortgage insurance equivalent. For example, Federal Housing Authority mortgage insurance premiums, USDA fees, or rural development guarantee fees.

fields.name: EstOtherDuesPaymentAmt
fields.helpText: Total proposed monthly payment on application property for homeowners association, co-op, condo, or planned unit development dues.

fields.name: EstOtherPaymentAmt
fields.helpText: Total proposed monthly payment for other housing expenses on application property.

fields.name: Lender_Header_Text
fields.fieldText: Select the type of mortgage loan the borrower's applying for

fields.name: Borrower_Lives_In_Community_Property_State
fields.fieldText: At least one borrower lives in a community property state

fields.name: Property_In_Community_Property_State
fields.fieldText: The property is located in a community property state

fields.name: Conversion_Of_Contract_For_Deed_Or_Land_Contract
fields.fieldText: Conversion of Contract for Deed or Land Contract
fields.helpText: The loan replaces existing seller financing.

fields.name: Renovation
fields.helpText: The loan finances both the purchase and renovation of the property.

fields.name: Construction_Conversion_Or_Construction_To_Permanent
fields.helpText: An interim construction loan that is to be converted to permanent financing.

fields.name: Single_Closing
fields.helpText: A construction-to-permanent loan with a single closing.

fields.name: Cost_Of_Construction_Or_Improvement
fields.helpText: Total cost of construction or planned improvements.

fields.name: Date_Acquired
fields.helpText: For a construction loan, the date lot was purchased.

fields.name: Original_Cost
fields.helpText: For a construction loan, the lot's original cost.

fields.name: Other_Refinance_Program_Type
fields.fieldText: If other was selected, details of other refinance program type.

fields.name: Mortgage_Loan_Finance_Energy_Related_Improvements
fields.fieldText: Mortgage loan to finance energy-related improvements

fields.name: IsSubjectToPriorityLien
fields.fieldText: Property is currently subject to a lien that could take priority over the first mortgage lien
fields.helpText: Select if the property has liens like a clean-energy lien paid for through property taxes.

fields.name: PurchasePriceAmount
fields.helpText: The selling price stated in the sales contract.

fields.name: LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount
fields.helpText: The cost or value of the land that's not part of the sales contract price. For example a Construction Conversion loan, a Construction-to-Permanent loan, or a Manufactured Housing transaction.

fields.name: OutstandingLoanAmount
fields.helpText: For a refinance loan, the toal amount of all mortgage loans on the application property to be paid off by the refinance loan.

fields.name: TotalDebtPaidOffAmount
fields.fieldText: Credit Card and Other Debt to Be Paid Off
fields.helpText: Total amount of all non-application property liabilities the borrower indicated would be paid off on or before closing.

fields.name: BorrowerClosingCostAmt
fields.helpText: Total closing costs due from the borrower, including prepaid and initial escrow payments.

fields.name: DiscountPointCostAmount
fields.helpText: The toal cost of the discount points purchased by the borrower due at closing.

fields.name: LoanExclFinMortInsAmt
fields.fieldText: Loan Amount Excluding Financed Mortgage Insurance
fields.helpText: Loan amount excluding the financed mortgage insurance or financed mortgage insurance equivalent.

fields.name: FinancedMortgageInsAmt
fields.helpText: Total amount of financed mortgage insurance or financed mortgage insurance equivalent.

fields.name: CreditFromSeller
fields.helpText: Total amount of borrower closing costs due from the seller.

fields.name: OtherCredit
fields.helpText: Total amount of all purchase credits like borrower credits, credits from third parties, and non-cash seller credits.

fields.name: Title_Holder_Name
fields.fieldText: Name to Hold Title to the Property
fields.helpText: Name of the title holder.

fields.name: Validation_Error_Message_Name
fields.fieldText: This is a required field.

fields.name: Is_Current_Title_Holder
fields.fieldText: For a refinance loan, name is current title holder
fields.helpText: For a refinance loan, the name listed to hold title is also a current title holder.

fields.name: Estate_Hold_Type
fields.helpText: How the estate is to be held.

fields.name: If_Leasehold_Enter_Expiration_Date
fields.helpText: If the lender is to hold a leasehold lien, the leasehold expiration date.

fields.name: Title_Type
fields.helpText: How the borrower or borrowers take title for the loan.

stages.name: Home_Ownership_Education
stages.label: Home Ownership Education and Housing Counseling

textTemplates.name: Loan_Purpose_Text
textTemplates.text: Select the purpose of the loan the borrower's applying for

textTemplates.name: Mortgage_Title_Text
textTemplates.text: Select the type of mortgage loan the borrower's applying for

textTemplates.name: ValidationMsgWithZero
textTemplates.text: Enter a number greater than or equal to 0.
